workout_explanation: This workout plan is designed for an advanced user with a 60-minute time constraint, focusing on the glutes, hamstrings, quadriceps, and calves.  The workout prioritizes compound movements to maximize time efficiency and overall muscle activation.  The exercise order is structured to allow for progressive fatigue, starting with the larger muscle groups (quadriceps) and moving to smaller, more isolated muscle groups (hamstrings, calves).  The volume of each set is chosen to align with the advanced user's capacity for higher intensity and volume, while still respecting the time constraint.  The use of alternative exercises provides flexibility and allows for adjustments based on individual preferences and equipment availability.  The workout incorporates a variety of rep ranges to target different muscle fibers and promote overall hypertrophy.  The total workout time, including rest periods, is approximately 55 minutes, well within the 60-minute time constraint.
